item.title: Passt
item.description: passt is a CLI tool and library that can be used to generate random strings, e.g. for use as passwords. It is very “weak” in that it doesn’t use any “real” cryptography and should therefor not be used as an actual password generator. You can use passt to generate random test input when testing software tho. Up to date information can be found on GitHub https://github.com/kevingimbel/passt. Usage: CLI Install $ cargo install passt Arguments
